009package ImageJ_Introduction;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015
016public class My_Inverter_B implements PlugIn {
017
018        public void run(String args) {
019                ImagePlus im = IJ.getImage();
020                
021                if (im.getType() != ImagePlus.GRAY8) {
022                        IJ.error("8-bit grayscale image required"); 
023                        return;
024                }
025                
026                ImageProcessor ip = im.getProcessor();
027                int M = ip.getWidth();
028                int N = ip.getHeight();
029
030                // iterate over all image coordinates (u,v)
031                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
032                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
033                                int p = ip.get(u, v);
034                                ip.set(u, v, 255 - p);
035                        }
036                }
037                
038                im.updateAndDraw();             // redraw the modified image
039        }
040}
